-- retrievePurRqList 구매요청 리스트 조회(main)
select a.S_CODE as sCode ,a.SAMPLE as sample ,a.M_CODE as mCode ,a.KNTTP as knttp ,a.USED_CODE as usedCode ,a.PSTYP as pstyp ,a.IZWEK as izwek ,a.BIZ_CD as bizCd ,a.SAKTO as sakto ,(SELECT CODE_NM FROM PR_CODEMASTER_T x WHERE x.CODE = RTRIM(a.EKGRP) AND x.DEL_FLAG = '0' AND x.GROUP_CODE = '01' AND x.REGION_CD = a.region_cd ) as ekgrpnm ,(SELECT CODE_NM FROM PR_CODEMASTER_T y WHERE y.CODE = RTRIM(a.SAKTO) AND y.DEL_FLAG = '0' AND y.GROUP_CODE = '10' AND y.REGION_CD = a.region_cd ) as saktonm ,a.EKGRP as ekgrp ,a.WERKS as werks ,a.ANLKL as anlkl ,a.SEQ_NUM as sCodeSeq ,a.IS_MRO as isMro from [dbo].[PR_HELPMASTER_T] a where a.REGION_CD ='01' and a.BIZ_CD = '01' /* 추후 02, 03 등록 가능성 있음 */ and a.USE_YN = 'Y'
and a.KNTTP = 'P' and a.PSTYP = '' and a.USED_CODE ='S' and a.IZWEK != '01'
and a.KNTTP = 'A' and a.PSTYP = ''
and a.KNTTP = 'P' and a.M_CODE ='투자'
and a.KNTTP = 'P' and a.PSTYP = '' and a.USED_CODE = 'O'
and a.S_CODE = #{sCode}
order by a.L_CODE, a.M_CODE, a.S_CODE asc

-- retrievePurRqDetailList 구매요청상세 리스트 조회) select a.banfn_prs as banfnPrs ,a.bnfpo_prs as bnfpoPrs ,a.seq_num as seqNum ,a.BNFPO as bnfpo ,a.s_code as sCode ,a.TXZ01 as txz01 ,a.KNTTP as knttp ,a.MENGE as menge ,a.MEINS as meins ,a.EEIND as eeind ,a.AFNAM as afnam ,a.MATKL as matkl ,a.WERKS as werks ,a.EKGRP as ekgrp ,a.BEDNR as bednr ,a.PREIS as preis ,a.WAERS as waers ,a.PEINH as peinh ,a.SAKTO as sakto ,a.IT_ANLN1 as itAnln1 ,a.POSID as posid ,a.POST1 as post1 ,a.PRS_FLAG as prsFlag ,a.ITEM_TXT as itemTxt ,a.MAKER as maker ,a.VENDOR as vendor ,a.CATALOGNO as catalogno ,a.POSITION as position ,a.USED_CODE as usedCode ,a.BIZ_CD as bizCd ,a.ATTC_FIL_ID as attcFilId ,a.HELP_SEQNUM as sCodeSeq ,a.MENGE * a.PREIS as totPreis ,(select (SELECT CODE_NM FROM PR_CODEMASTER_T y WHERE y.CODE = RTRIM(a.SAKTO) AND y.DEL_FLAG = '0' AND y.GROUP_CODE = '10' AND y.REGION_CD = x.region_cd ) as saktonm from [dbo].[PR_HELPMASTER_T] x where x.REGION_CD ='01' and x.BIZ_CD = '01' /* 추후 02, 03 등록 가능성 있음 */ and x.SEQ_NUM = a.HELP_SEQNUM ) as saktonm ,(select max(bnfpo_prs)+1 from PR_PRSREQ_T x where x.banfn_prs = a.banfn_prs) as nextSeq from PR_PRSREQ_T a where a.PRS_FLAG <> 'D' and a.banfn_prs = #{banfnPrs} order by a.banfn_prs desc, a.bnfpo_prs desc

select a.banfn_prs as banfnPrs ,a.bnfpo_prs as bnfpoPrs ,a.seq_num as seqNum ,a.s_code as sCode ,a.TXZ01 as txz01 ,a.KNTTP as knttp ,a.MENGE as menge ,a.MEINS as meins ,a.EEIND as eeind ,a.AFNAM as afnam ,a.MATKL as matkl ,a.WERKS as werks ,a.EKGRP as ekgrp ,a.BEDNR as bednr ,a.PREIS as preis ,a.WAERS as waers ,a.PEINH as peinh ,a.SAKTO as sakto ,a.IT_ANLN1 as itAnln1 ,a.POSID as posid ,a.POST1 as post1 ,a.PRS_FLAG as prsFlag ,a.ITEM_TXT as itemTxt ,a.MAKER as maker ,a.VENDOR as vendor ,a.CATALOGNO as catalogno ,a.POSITION as position ,a.USED_CODE as usedCode ,a.BIZ_CD as bizCd ,a.ATTC_FIL_ID as attcFilId ,a.HELP_SEQNUM as tabId ,a.HELP_SEQNUM as sCodeSeq ,b.G_CHECK as gCheck ,b.G_CHECK2 as gCheck2 from [dbo].[PR_PRSREQ_T] a inner join PR_APPROVAL_T b on b.banfn_prs = a.banfn_prs where a.PRS_FLAG <> 'D' and a.BANFN_PRS = #{banfnPrs} and a.BNFPO_PRS = #{bnfpoPrs}
/* banfn_prs 번호채번 */ select next value for PR_PRSREQ_Q01;
/* seq_num 번호채번 */ select next value for PR_PRSREQ_Q02;
mapper.insert:
/* insertPurRqInfo 구매요청 등록 */
INSERT INTO PR_PRSREQ_T ( BANFN_PRS , BNFPO_PRS , SEQ_NUM , S_CODE , KNTTP , PSTYP , TXZ01 , MENGE , MEINS , EEIND , AFNAM , MATKL , WERKS , EKGRP , BEDNR , PREIS , WAERS , PEINH , SAKTO , POSID , POST1 , PRS_FLAG , IZWEK , ITEM_TXT , MAKER , VENDOR , CATALOGNO , POSITION , USED_CODE , BIZ_CD , ATTC_FIL_ID , BADATE , HELP_SEQNUM ) values ( #{banfnPrs} , ISNULL(#{bnfpoPrs}, 1) , (next value for [dbo].[PR_PRSREQ_Q02]) , ISNULL(#{sCodeNm},'') , ISNULL((SELECT KNTTP FROM [dbo].[PR_HELPMASTER_T] a WHERE a.seq_num = #{sCodeSeq}),'') , ISNULL((SELECT PSTYP FROM [dbo].[PR_HELPMASTER_T] a WHERE a.seq_num = #{sCodeSeq}),'') , ISNULL(#{txz01},'') , CONVERT(NUMERIC(13,0), ISNULL(#{menge},'0')) , ISNULL(#{meins},'') , REPLACE(#{eeind},'-','') , ISNULL(#{afnam},'') , ISNULL((SELECT MATKL FROM [dbo].[PR_HELPMASTER_T] a WHERE a.seq_num = #{sCodeSeq}),'') , ISNULL(#{werks},'') , ISNULL(#{ekgrp},'') , ISNULL(#{bednr},'') , CONVERT(NUMERIC(12,2), ISNULL(#{preis},'0')) , 'KRW' , CONVERT(NUMERIC(5,0), ISNULL(#{peinh},'1')) , ISNULL((SELECT SAKTO FROM [dbo].[PR_HELPMASTER_T] a WHERE a.seq_num = #{sCodeSeq}),'') , ISNULL(#{posid},'') , ISNULL(#{post1},'') , ISNULL(#{prsFlag},'0') , ISNULL((SELECT IZWEK FROM [dbo].[PR_HELPMASTER_T] a WHERE a.seq_num = #{sCodeSeq}),'') , ISNULL(#{itemTxt},'') , ISNULL(#{maker},'') , ISNULL(#{vendor},'') , ISNULL(#{catalogno},'') , ISNULL(#{position},'') , ISNULL((SELECT USED_CODE FROM [dbo].[PR_HELPMASTER_T] a WHERE a.seq_num = #{sCodeSeq}),'') , ISNULL((SELECT BIZ_CD FROM [dbo].[PR_HELPMASTER_T] a WHERE a.seq_num = #{sCodeSeq}),'') , ISNULL(#{attcFilId},'') , getdate() , #{sCodeSeq} )
mapper.update:
/* updatePurRqInfo 구매요청 수정 */
UPDATE PR_PRSREQ_T SET S_CODE = ISNULL(#{sCodeNm},'') , KNTTP = ISNULL((SELECT KNTTP FROM [dbo].[PR_HELPMASTER_T] a WHERE a.seq_num = #{sCodeSeq}),'') , PSTYP = ISNULL((SELECT PSTYP FROM [dbo].[PR_HELPMASTER_T] a WHERE a.seq_num = #{sCodeSeq}),'') , TXZ01 = ISNULL(#{txz01},'') , MENGE = CONVERT(NUMERIC(13,0), ISNULL(#{menge},'0')) , MEINS = ISNULL(#{meins},'') , EEIND = REPLACE(#{eeind},'-','') , MATKL = ISNULL((SELECT MATKL FROM [dbo].[PR_HELPMASTER_T] a WHERE a.seq_num = #{sCodeSeq}),'') , WERKS = ISNULL(#{werks},'') , EKGRP = ISNULL(#{ekgrp},'') , PREIS = CONVERT(NUMERIC(12,2), ISNULL(#{preis},'0')) , PEINH = CONVERT(NUMERIC(5,0), ISNULL(#{peinh},'1')) , SAKTO = ISNULL((SELECT SAKTO FROM [dbo].[PR_HELPMASTER_T] a WHERE a.seq_num = #{sCodeSeq}),'') , POSID = ISNULL(#{posid},'') , IZWEK = ISNULL((SELECT IZWEK FROM [dbo].[PR_HELPMASTER_T] a WHERE a.seq_num = #{sCodeSeq}),'') , ITEM_TXT = ISNULL(#{itemTxt},'') , MAKER = ISNULL(#{maker},'') , VENDOR = ISNULL(#{vendor},'') , CATALOGNO = ISNULL(#{catalogno},'') , POSITION = ISNULL(#{position},'') , USED_CODE = ISNULL((SELECT USED_CODE FROM [dbo].[PR_HELPMASTER_T] a WHERE a.seq_num = #{sCodeSeq}),'') , BIZ_CD = ISNULL((SELECT BIZ_CD FROM [dbo].[PR_HELPMASTER_T] a WHERE a.seq_num = #{sCodeSeq}),'') , HELP_SEQNUM = CONVERT(NUMERIC(18,0), ISNULL(#{sCodeSeq},'0')) , ATTC_FIL_ID = ISNULL(#{attcFilId},'') WHERE BANFN_PRS = #{banfnPrs} AND BNFPO_PRS = #{bnfpoPrs}
mapper.insert: /* 구매요청 결재의뢰 저장 */ INSERT INTO PR_APPROVAL_T ( BANFN_PRS , APR1_PERNR , APR1_ENAME , APR2_PERNR , APR2_ENAME , APR3_PERNR , APR3_ENAME , APR4_PERNR , APR4_ENAME , G_CHECK , G_CHECK2 , OPIN_DOC , WBS_PERNR ) values ( ISNULL(#{banfnPrs} , '') , ISNULL(#{apr1Pernr}, '') , ISNULL(#{apr1Ename}, '') , ISNULL(#{apr2Pernr}, '') , ISNULL(#{apr2Ename}, '') , ISNULL(#{apr3Pernr}, '') , ISNULL(#{apr3Ename}, '') , ISNULL(#{apr4Pernr}, '') , ISNULL(#{apr4Ename}, '') , ISNULL(#{gCheck} , 'N') , ISNULL(#{gCheck2} , 'N') , ISNULL(#{opinDoc} , '') , ISNULL(#{wbsPernr} , '') )
